gout.title: Supporting Gout
gout.tip: Prioritize low-purine foods: green vegetables, fruits, low-fat dairy
gout.avoid: Limit: organ meats, rich seafood, beer, sugary drinks
gout.encourage: Encourage: plenty of water, cherries, vitamin C

cholesterol.title: Supporting High Cholesterol
cholesterol.tip: Increase omega-3: salmon, chia seeds, walnuts. Reduce saturated fats
cholesterol.avoid: Limit: fried foods, animal fats, fast food
cholesterol.encourage: Encourage: oatmeal, leafy greens, legumes, fruit

back_pain.title: Supporting Back Pain
back_pain.tip: Anti-inflammatory foods: turmeric, ginger, fatty fish, leafy greens
back_pain.avoid: Limit: inflammatory foods, refined sugar, alcohol
back_pain.encourage: Encourage: rest breaks, proper sitting posture support
